result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Timothy J Broyld appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Paul Garland Bonneson in court for Timothy J Broyld.  Attorney Careen Marie Gordon in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for preliminary hearing. Preliminary hearing proceeded. Sworn for the State: MPD Detective E. Gonzalez. State rests. Defense rests. Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Original information received and filed; defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Case is adjourned to Branch 06. Scheduling conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Timothy J Broyld in court in person, in custody.  Attorney Paul Garland Bonneson in court in person for Timothy J Broyld.  Attorney Jack T Eichorst in court in person for State of Wisconsin. 

Case is set for a Status Of Counsel. Attorney Paul Garland Bonneson confirms acceptance of the case for the court. Requests a Preliminary Hearing date. Defense Counsel also motions to be heard on bail. State makes opposing argument. Court denies bail modification without prejudice due to the early stage of the case. Is open to revisiting the matter at a future date. Matter is adjourned.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
MOTION FOR MODIFICATION OF BAIL, received and filed.

Defendant Timothy J Broyld in court, in custody.  Tom Reed in court for the office of the Public Defenders.  Attorney Samuel Tufford for Jack T Eichorst in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Matter in court for State vs Lee hearing. 

Counsel has yet to be appointed for the defendant.  Attorney Reed give additional thoughts.  Previous counsel had to withdraw due to a conflict of interest.  Additional time is requested.

Court find the PD's office is making due and diligent efforts to appoint counsel and grants additional time to appoint counsel.
Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
OSPD APPOINTMENT OF COUNSEL REPORT, received and filed.

Defendant Timothy J Broyld appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.
Hearing scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report, received and filed.

Defendant Timothy J Broyld not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail.  (Timothy J. Broyld - 3C/01, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Timothy J Broyld not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Due to an ethical conflict, Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Status conference scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, appear by video. Defendant Timothy J Broyld not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Due to court congestion, Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with A.M.X or any child under the age of 16.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Timothy J Broyld in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Timothy J Broyld in custody.  Sara Waldschmidt-DeSmet appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he/she may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he/she meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
